MVPA.

helper functions for performing MVPA.

Modules

zpyhelper.MVPA.estimators

Estimator classes for MVPA analysis All classes takes activity pattern matrix as an input and performs different types of RSA analysis based on the activity pattern matrix.

zpyhelper.MVPA.preprocessors

Methods for preprocessing activity pattern matrix

zpyhelper.MVPA.rdm

This module contains helper function for computing representation (dis)similarity matrix
